segments.text: Hey Ted , I saw this ad in the paper . You should take a look .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s for a job . It looks perfect for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s see ... ' Wanted , manager for up-and-coming firm . Must have good organizational skills . Experience a plus . Please contact Betty Sue . ' Oh , I don ’ t know ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , what have you got to lose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here , I'll help you type one up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Mary . You ’ re a real pal . I'll call now to set up an interview .
segments.speaker: S2
